resources.string: Choose the number that is greater.\nQuestions may be repeated until you get 20 points.

"Congratulations on completing the level!\n Did you know that the number 8 is considered lucky in many cultures around the world? In Chinese culture, it's particularly auspicious because the pronunciation of the word for 'eight' sounds similar to the word for 'wealth' or 'prosper'. "
Сhoose the planet that is closer to the sun.\nQuestions may be repeated until you get 20 points.

"Congratulations on completing the level!\n New levels will appear in the game soon!\n Did you know that Venus rotates in the opposite direction to most planets in our solar system? This means that if you were standing on Venus, the Sun would rise in the west and set in the east."
Сhoose the item that weighs more.\nQuestions may be repeated until you get 20 points.

"Congratulations on completing the level!\n The largest pencil in the world was created in 2007 and weighed approximately 82 tons. It was constructed in Karlsruhe, Germany, standing over 22 meters tall."
